title: Python
content: Python is a very simple and readable language. I love writing code in Python.

title: JavaScript
content: JavaScript was my first programming language. I feel very comfortable when it comes to working with JavaScript.

title: Django
content: It is a very amazing framework. It is very handy, organized, and an advanced framework. Therefore, I mostly choose Django for backend stuff.

title: React
content: The creation of Facebook is very beautiful. React is a very good choice for        writing the frontend of a web app. I feel very comfortable with it.

title: MongoDB
content: MongoDB is very powerful and easy to use. I mostly choose MongoDB over any other database. I love it because of its schema-less nature.

title: HTML
content: I mostly use HTML for Hacking purpose  (Just kidding)ðŸ˜‰.

title: CSS
content: As a backend developer, I still love to do styling in CSS.

title: Tailwind
content: A very beautiful framework for CSS. It increases my speed 2X during  styling.

title: Redux Toolkit
content: Redux Toolkit is a very beautiful library for state management. It helps a lot while dealing with complex stuff.
